enclose.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to put something inside an envelope as well as a letter
enclose.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Please enclose a cheque with your order.
Please find enclosed an agenda for the meeting.
enclose.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to surround something, especially with a fence or wall, in order to make it separate
enclose.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The pool area is enclosed by a six-foot wall.
enclose.translation[0].definitions[1].no: Enclose is usually passive in this meaning
